Player History
Drafted in 40th round, 629th overall pick, by Montreal in 2015...
Injured on 4/21/2015 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/26/2015 with a Bruised Heel, out for 4 days...
Injured on 6/27/2016 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 8/19/2016, off Thomas Svoboda (DET)...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 6/7/2017 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 3 days...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 3/7/2019.
Injured on 3/12/2019 with a Fractured Ulna, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 6/2/2019 with a Inflamed Hamstring Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
9/6/2019: Signed a contract extension with Houston, $3,200,000 per year, for 2 years.
